title: Pixel 5 wifi calling support not working - is it country specific? Israel
content:
I'm trying to enable wifi calling in my new pixel 5.
My carrier enabled wifi calling.

But no matter where i look, there is no option for wifi calling (phone app or in settings)
I've followed several guides.
As well for looking in the hidden menu in the dialer app( it's greyed out)

Also tried to insert different sim from another carrier that had wifi calling (and it works on their phone)

It seems like a problem wifi my phone, it's brand new and most up to date firmware on it.

Thanks for reading.
